Class tripleplay.game.ScreenSpace

Changed Constructors
ScreenSpace(Game, GroupLayer) Change in type from void to (Game, GroupLayer).
 Creates a screen space which will manage screens for {@code game}.
 

Removed Methods
void paint(Clock) Includes the screen space and its screens in the game paint loop.
void update(int) Includes the screen space and its screens in the game update loop.
 

Added Methods
Screen bottom() Returns the lowest screen in the stack.
Screen focus() Returns the currently focused screen.
void initAdd(Screen, Dir) Adds {@code screen} to this space but does not activate or wake it.
Screen target() Returns the target screen in the current transition, or null.
float transPct() Returns the degree of completeness ({@code [0,1]}) of any in-progress transition, or 0.
